snippet: Robert Gangi, director of the Police Reform Organizing Project, says the Police Department’s problems go beyond a few bad cops.
lead_paragraph: Robert Gangi, director of the Police Reform Organizing Project, says the Police Department’s problems go beyond a few bad cops.

headline.main: Reforming the Police Dept., Beyond the ‘Bad Apples’
headline.print_headline: Reforming the Police Dept., Beyond the ‘Bad Apples’
